<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// isEdgeFeasible - Return true if the control flow edge from the &#39;From&#39; basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block to the &#39;To&#39; basic block is currently feasible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpinstvisitor/#aef496b441a70c38fb9f4de253e364256"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpinstvisitor/#aef496b441a70c38fb9f4de253e364256">SCCPInstVisitor::isEdgeFeasible</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;To)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we&#39;ve called markEdgeExecutable on the edge yet. (We could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be more aggressive and try to consider edges which haven&#39;t been marked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// yet, but there isn&#39;t any need.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownFeasibleEdges.count(Edge(From, To));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visit Implementations - Something changed in this instruction, either an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand made a transition, or the instruction is newly executable.  Change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the value type of I to reflect these changes if appropriate.  This method</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// makes sure to do the following actions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 If a phi node merges two constants in, and has conflicting value coming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    from different branches, or if the PHI node merges in an overdefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    value, then the PHI node becomes overdefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 If a phi node merges only constants in, and they all agree on value, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    PHI node becomes a constant value equal to that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 If V &lt;- x (op) y &amp;&amp; isConstant(x) &amp;&amp; isConstant(y) V = Constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 If V &lt;- x (op) y &amp;&amp; (isOverdefined(x) || isOverdefined(y)) V = Overdefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 5 If V &lt;- MEM or V &lt;- CALL or V &lt;- (unknown) then V = Overdefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 6 If a conditional branch has a value that is constant, make the selected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    destination executable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 7 If a conditional branch has a value that is overdefined, make all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    successors executable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCCPInstVisitor::visitPHINode(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;PN) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this PN returns a struct, just mark the result overdefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We could do a lot better than this if code actually uses this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a81eef9d7336f7ee43be79630d8e8ec86">isStructTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)markOverdefined(&amp;PN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getValueState(&amp;PN).isOverdefined())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Quick exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Super-extra-high-degree PHI nodes are unlikely to ever be marked constant,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and slow us down a lot.  Just mark them overdefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#aef51af4b490af6b3bf2dfbc8737a8f9f">getNumIncomingValues</a>() &gt; 64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)markOverdefined(&amp;PN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumActiveIncoming = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at all of the executable operands of the PHI node.  If any of them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are overdefined, the PHI becomes overdefined as well.  If they are all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant, and they agree with each other, the PHI becomes the identical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant.  If they are constant and don&#39;t agree, the PHI is a constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range. If there are no executable operands, the PHI remains unknown.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement">ValueLatticeElement</a> PhiState = getValueState(&amp;PN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#aef51af4b490af6b3bf2dfbc8737a8f9f">getNumIncomingValues</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpinstvisitor/#aef496b441a70c38fb9f4de253e364256">isEdgeFeasible</a>(PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ac53e1aabdf64e91b8b325bcac250d8a9">getIncomingBlock</a>(i), PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement">ValueLatticeElement</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a> = getValueState(PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#aca1fd00f3ab63ec8f0f1ccc2093a9f6d">getIncomingValue</a>(i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PhiState.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#aceaa5f442dd3df34f51799f2999d237e">mergeIn</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumActiveIncoming++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PhiState.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a226c3252bd1261be2ff904697586f6d8">isOverdefined</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We allow up to 1 range extension per active incoming value and one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// additional extension. Note that we manually adjust the number of range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extensions to match the number of active incoming values. This helps to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// limit multiple extensions caused by the same incoming value, if other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incoming values are equal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  mergeInValue(&amp;PN, PhiState,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuelatticeelement/mergeoptions">ValueLatticeElement::MergeOptions</a>().setMaxWidenSteps(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement">ValueLatticeElement</a> &amp;PhiStateRef = getValueState(&amp;PN);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CopyOfCR = CopyOfVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a3b5efcaf6d7833656101e9d19b00775f">asConstantRange</a>(CopyOf-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;UndefAllowed=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Treat an unresolved input like a full range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopyOfCR.isEmptySet())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CopyOfCR = ConstantRange::getFull(CopyOfCR.getBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewCR = ImposedCR.intersectWith(CopyOfCR);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the existing information is != x, do not use the information from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a chained predicate, as the != x information is more likely to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// helpful in practice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CopyOfCR.contains(NewCR) &amp;&amp; CopyOfCR.getSingleMissingElement())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NewCR = CopyOfCR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new range is based on a branch condition. That guarantees that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// neither of the compare operands can be undef in the branch targets,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unless we have conditions that are always true/false (e.g. icmp ule</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i32, %a, i32&#95;max). For the latter overdefined/empty range will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inferred, but the branch will get folded accordingly anyways.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addAdditionalUser(OtherOp, &amp;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlight">        mergeInValue(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>, &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a1fa37f9808504c2a3d588ec0aa1532ac">ValueLatticeElement::getRange</a>(NewCR, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;MayIncludeUndef&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78baa719225e2de4059f93fd3209e1f48218">CmpInst::ICMP&#95;EQ</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 (CondVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a62d37ceb318e78806df7e0a928b0eb1c">isConstant</a>() || CondVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a3e15dd37f1b32b64bf9ff7c7ad03d70d">isNotConstant</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-integer values or integer constant expressions, only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagate equal constants or not-constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addAdditionalUser(OtherOp, &amp;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlight">        mergeInValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>, &amp;CB, CondVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78bac17897ebf2f6a6986280fc3bdf28a30a">CmpInst::ICMP&#95;NE</a> &amp;&amp; CondVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a62d37ceb318e78806df7e0a928b0eb1c">isConstant</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Propagate inequalities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addAdditionalUser(OtherOp, &amp;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlight">        mergeInValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>, &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#a3347382fc7040a7bc3ed0c7fcf6442c6">ValueLatticeElement::getNot</a>(CondVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#ab79de6040b9a8bacd648c5916fb36cd9">getConstant</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)mergeInValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>, &amp;CB, CopyOfVal);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute result range for intrinsics supported by ConstantRange.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do this even if we don&#39;t know a range for all operands, as we may</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueLatticeElement &amp;State = getValueState(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (State.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuelatticeelement/#ab20e06908032fd7028c20c1d2d5a248a">isUnknownOrUndef</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The common case is that we aren&#39;t tracking the callee, either because we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are not doing interprocedural analysis or the callee is indirect, or is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// external.  Handle these cases first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;isDeclaration())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleCallOverdefined(CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a single/zero retval case, see if we&#39;re tracking the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;STy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StructType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getReturnType())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MRVFunctionsTracked.count(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleCallOverdefined(CB); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not tracking this callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are tracking this callee, propagate the result of the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into this call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = STy-&gt;getNumElements(); i != e; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mergeInValue(getStructValueState(&amp;CB, i), &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   TrackedMultipleRetVals&#91;std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, i)&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   <a href="#a080450f5d7071db2a77886da534ac3ab">getMaxWidenStepsOpts</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TFRVI = TrackedRetVals.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TFRVI == TrackedRetVals.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleCallOverdefined(CB); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not tracking this callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If so, propagate the return value of the callee into this call result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    mergeInValue(&amp;CB, TFRVI-&gt;second, <a href="#a080450f5d7071db2a77886da534ac3ab">getMaxWidenStepsOpts</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpinstvisitor/#a9834c4d7f79bbaa2e96014f6ea96e12e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpinstvisitor/#a9834c4d7f79bbaa2e96014f6ea96e12e">SCCPInstVisitor::solve</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process the work lists until they are empty!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BBWorkList.empty() || !InstWorkList.empty() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">         !OverdefinedInstWorkList.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process the overdefined instruction&#39;s work list first, which drives other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// things to overdefined more quickly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OverdefinedInstWorkList.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = OverdefinedInstWorkList.pop&#95;back&#95;val();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// While solving the dataflow for a function, we don&#39;t compute a result for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operations with an undef operand, to allow undef to be lowered to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// constant later. For example, constant folding of &quot;zext i8 undef to i16&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// would result in &quot;i16 0&quot;, and if undef is later lowered to &quot;i8 1&quot;, then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// zext result would become &quot;i16 1&quot; and would result into an overdefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lattice value once merged with the previous result. Not computing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// result of the zext (treating undef the same as unknown) allows us to handle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a later undef-&gt;constant lowering more optimally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// However, if the operand remains undef when the solver returns, we do need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to assign some result to the instruction (otherwise we would treat it as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unreachable). For simplicity, we mark any instructions that are still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unknown as overdefined.</span></CodeLine>
